original: unfold iter. destruct n. - simpl. split. reflexivity. auto. - intros H. exfalso. specialize (list_bool_next_def l) as [m Hm]. change (iter list_bool_next l (S n) = nil) in H. simpl in H. rewrite Hm in H. generalize dependent l. induction l. + intros. simpl in H. congruence. + intros. simpl in H. inversion Hm; subst. ++ rewrite app_nil_r in H. simpl in H. destruct (list_repeat Zero k) eqn:E. ** inversion H. ** apply app_inj_tail in H. omega. ++ rewrite <- app_assoc in H. inversion H.
